name: MTLLinkedFunctions
desc: A set of related functions that Metal links to when necessary to create the function object.

items.name: var functions: [MTLFunction]?
items.desc: An array of function objects to link to the new function.

items.name: var binaryFunctions: [MTLFunction]?
items.desc: An array of function objects already compiled to a binary representation to link.

items.name: var groups: [String : [MTLFunction]]?
items.desc: An optional list of groups specifying which functions your shader can call at each call site.

items.name: var privateFunctions: [MTLFunction]?
items.desc: An array of function objects to link to the new function, without exporting the functions publicly.
